name: unpolluted
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not affected by pollution (= damage caused to water, air, etc. by harmful substances or waste): In areas with unpolluted air, tree branches are often covered with grey, brown and green lichen. The wild salmon needs cold, clear, unpolluted water to survive. Glacier Bay is wild, clean and unpolluted.
not spoiled by something: She grew up in Liverpool and speaks in a lilting accent, wholly unpolluted by the years she's spent in London.
More examplesFewer examplesWe see the Milky Way in the night sky in unpolluted areas (especially remote, rural locations).Mineral water must be bottled at source, and come from a protected and unpolluted source. No-one has any right to inflict tobacco fumes on anyone else, but people do have the right to breathe air that is unpolluted.Make it clear to everyone that you're ready to take a deep breath of fresh, unpolluted success.They hark back to a bygone age, when society was unpolluted by corruption, greed and sin.
